properties.Name: CustomerSalesTerm
properties.Description: The Sales Term(s) that are offered or provided to the customer for purchases/transactions of the associated amounts during the indicated period.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: SalesTermId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Sales Term.

Columns.Name: MinimumTransactionAmount
Columns.Description: The minimum transaction amount in the associated transaction range for which the associated Sales Term(s) are offered or extended.

Columns.Name: MaximumTransactionAmount
Columns.Description: The maximum transaction amount in the associated transaction range for which the associated Sales Term(s) are offered or extended.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated customer sales term information is defined.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated customer sales term information is defined.

Columns.Name: CustomerSalesTermNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the customer sales term.
